name: Apollo's Daughter
description:
Small game I made as a final project freshman year. Nothing too special but I thought I would post it anyway for my portfolio!

It's a 2D Platformer with two levels you have to reach the end of. Avoid the spiders! Some of them can shoot poisonous webs...

WASD to move, spacebar to jump, click and move mouse to shoot and aim your projectiles. 

Pro tip: if you keep holding, it will keep shooting! You can also double jump :)

If the screen turns red you lose, if it turns green you win!
